title: Cara Delevingne nails her off-duty style in a green coat and beanie as she enjoys stroll in London
text:
She has seen incredible success thanks to her modelling and fledgling acting career.

And Cara Delevingne, 27, took a break from her hectic work schedule as she enjoyed a low-key stroll in London on Tuesday.

The multi-talented star nailed her day off style in a bright green North Face coat and casual slim leg jogging bottoms.

Casual outing: Cara Delevingne, 27, took a break from her hectic work schedule as she enjoyed a low-key stroll in London on Tuesday

Cara teamed her look with a simple white top and comfortable trainers as she strolled along in the British capital.

The catwalk queen added to the off-duty look with a pair of shades and tamed her blonde locks in place with a pair of super cool shades.

Her sighting comes after Cara praised girlfriend Ashley Benson for making her feel like the 'luckiest girl in the world'.

Speaking at the 2019 Girl Up #GirlHero Awards in Los Angeles on Sunday, Cara gushed: 'It's so nice to have someone in my life that supports me so much and loves me. I'm the luckiest girl in the world.'

Low-key: The multi-talented star nailed her day off style in a bright green North Face coat and casual slim leg jogging bottoms

Ashley and Cara's romance has gone from strength to strength since they first started dating in May 2018.

Cara recently spoke to Porter, the digital edition of Net-A-Porter, about why her bond with Ashley is different from her previous relationships.

'I’d never truly let anyone in before, for fear of them leaving. I never really trusted people, or felt worthy of it, and I always pushed them away,' shared Cara.

The model and actress said of Ashley: 'She’s the first person that has said: "You can’t push me away. I’m going to be nice to you, I love you."'

Cara recalled: 'I’m just like, wait, so all I have to do is just let you be nice to me? Why have I never done that before? OK.'

Although Ashley lives in Los Angeles and Cara's Amazon Prime show Carnival Row is shot in Prague, they have managed to keep the romance afloat.

'Long-distance relationships are always tough. We make it work, though. We have to. And it definitely makes me a better, happier person,' she said.

Smitten: Her sighting comes after Cara praised girlfriend Ashley Benson for making her feel like the 'luckiest girl in the world'
description: Cara Delevingne, 27, took a break from her hectic work schedule as she enjoyed a low-key stroll in London on Tuesday.
